code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./SkuSearch.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SkuSearch=()=>{const[sku,setSku]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSearch=event=>{event.preventDefault();if(sku.trim()){navigate("/sku/".concat(sku));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12 sku-search-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSearch,className:"search-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:sku,onChange:e=>setSku(e.target.value),placeholder:"Type here",className:"search-input rounded-pill border px-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-dark px-5 rounded-pill",children:"Search"})]})});};export default SkuSearch;
